item.title: About me
item.author: drunkensage82@gmail.com (Drunken Sage)
item.description: While details about myself I feel are rather non-important, they might help you to better understand my journey, and see the lens that distorts my viewpoints. I was raised in a very strict view of Christianity, with little tolerance for other ideas or viewpoints.
